stimulusHtml: Four-year-old Mikal avoids eye contact with strangers and family members alike. He has difficulty functioning outside of a very rigid routine and will exhibit extreme distress if his routine is disrupted even slightly. Which of the following is Mikalâ€™s behavior most consistent with?
choicesHtml:
Autism spectrum disorder

Narcissistic personality disorder 

Persistent depressive disorder

Panic disorder
